thread.section_title: OLDIES.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OLDIES.com | oldies.com | 7 of 418
thread.title: Ricky

author: Ricky
title: Ricky
text: It was great selection great movies but the only real problems i experienced was some of my order wasn't shipped and it didn't say why i checked online and they didn't appear to be out not sure what happened and they dont charge your card right away and then ship when they can is only problem i have with it and if not available could use a reason why you didnt receive them but other than that overall good experience takes a little while to get order placed and get them but there great movies thanks so much for the movies
